statements: SELECT * FROM event_attendance;
SELECT event_name, event_date, attendance_status FROM event_attendance WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT attendee_id, attendee_name FROM event_attendance WHERE attendance_status = 'Attended' ORDER BY attendee_name ASC;
SELECT event_id, event_name, event_date FROM event_attendance WHERE event_date < '2022-12-31' ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM event_attendance WHERE attendee_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM event_attendance;
SELECT event_name, attendee_name, attendance_status FROM event_attendance WHERE attendance_status = 'Present';
SELECT event_id, event_date, attendee_id FROM event_attendance WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT DISTINCT attendee_name FROM event_attendance ORDER BY attendee_name ASC;
SELECT event_id, event_name, attendee_name, attendance_status FROM event_attendance WHERE event_name LIKE '%Conference%' ORDER BY event_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM EventAttendees
SELECT attendee_name, attendance_status FROM EventAttendees ORDER BY attendee_name DESC
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM Events ORDER BY event_date ASC
SELECT event_name, event_location FROM Events WHERE event_date = '2023-10-15'
SELECT attendee_name FROM EventAttendees WHERE attendance_status = 'Attending'
SELECT event_id, event_name, event_date, event_location FROM Events WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT event_name, event_location FROM Events WHERE event_date <= '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM Events WHERE event_location LIKE 'New%';
SELECT event_name, event_location, event_date FROM Events WHERE event_location = 'London' ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT E.event_name, E.event_location, EA.attendance_status FROM Events E JOIN EventAttendees EA ON E.event_id = EA.event_id WHERE EA.attendee_id = 101;
SELECT * FROM event_attendance;
SELECT attendee_id, attendance_status FROM event_attendance;
SELECT event_name, event_date, event_location FROM event_details;
SELECT * FROM attendee_details WHERE attendee_id = 1;
SELECT attendee_name, attendee_email FROM attendee_details WHERE attendee_id = 2;
SELECT event_id, attendee_id, attendance_status FROM event_attendance WHERE attendance_status='Attended';
SELECT event_name, event_location FROM event_details WHERE event_date='2022-09-15';
SELECT attendee_name, attendee_email FROM attendee_details WHERE attendee_phone='123-456-7890';
SELECT * FROM event_details ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT event_name, COUNT(attendee_id) AS total_attendees FROM event_attendance GROUP BY event_name;
SELECT * FROM events;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT event_id, event_name, event_location FROM events WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT attendee_name, attendee_email FROM attendees WHERE attendee_id = 101;
SELECT event_id, attendee_id, attendance_status FROM event_attendees WHERE attendance_status = 'Attended';
SELECT event_id, event_name FROM events;
SELECT attendee_id, attendee_name, attendee_email FROM attendees WHERE attendee_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT event_id, event_name, event_date, event_location FROM events WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT event_id, attendee_id, attendance_status FROM event_attendees WHERE attendance_status = 'Attended' ORDER BY event_id;
SELECT event_id, SUM(rating) AS total_rating FROM event_feedback GROUP BY event_id HAVING total_rating > 20;
SELECT * FROM event_attendees
SELECT event_id, event_name, event_date FROM events
SELECT attendee_id, attendee_name, email, phone_number FROM attendees
SELECT attendee_name, email FROM attendees WHERE attendee_id = 1
SELECT event_id, attendance_status, registration_date FROM event_attendees WHERE attendee_id = 5
SELECT * FROM event_attendees
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM events ORDER BY event_date DESC
SELECT attendee_name, email, phone_number FROM attendees WHERE attendee_name LIKE '%John%'
SELECT event_name, location, event_type FROM events WHERE event_type = 'Conference'
SELECT event_id, COUNT(attendee_id) AS total_attendees FROM event_attendees GROUP BY event_id
